page.title: 11Children's Views of Aldridge
page.content: Aldridge is a nice place to live because it is quiet and I have friends here to play with. Aldridge Shopping centre is better than Walsall because all the shops are in one big group and so you only have a short distance to walk to get to another shop. It is a good place because you have plenty of ground in the area to play on. Behind the factory called T.I. there are football pitches and a woodland walk. Opposite where I live there is a park but it keeps getting vandalised and the council take things away like the slide. Anchor Meadow could be improved by removing some of the rubbish. They cleared ground there to build a hospital but changed their mind. I really enjoy living in Aldridge, the people are friendly. At school in Summer I play on our sports field. At least we are not stuck in the town.
